name: Run Panda Run
description:
Your little Panda needs to outrun the angry mob with the sanitizers

Created by the Panda-o-krator jam team (in 2 days) for the The Panda-mic Game Jam. 
Instructions:
Move left-right with arrow keys, jump with space.
Eat apples to gain stamina, but not too many of them cause they slow you down.
Avoid angry mob's sanitizers, and don't let them catch you. Avoid other animals XD
